CIAttributeDescription: Distorts an image by stretching and or cropping to fit a target size.

inputCenterStretchAmount.CIAttributeDescription: Determine how much the center of the image is stretched if stretching is used. If value is 0 then the center of the image maintains the original aspect ratio.  If 1 then the image is stretched uniformly.

inputImage.CIAttributeDescription: The image to use as an input image. For filters that also use a background image, this is the foreground image.

inputCropAmount.CIAttributeDescription: Determines if and how much cropping should be used to achieve the target size. If value is 0 then only stretching is used.  If 1 then only cropping is used.

inputSize.CIAttributeDescription: The size in pixels of the output image.
